## IChartDataCell.Value 属性

获取或设置单元格的值。可读/写对象。

```csharp
public object Value { get; set; }
```

### 示例

```csharp
[C#]
workbook.GetCell(0, "F2").Value = -2.5;
workbook.GetCell(0, "G3").Value = 6.3;
```
